name: Space Funeral: Nuclear Winter
description:
Space Funeral: Nuclear Winter

It's christmas time and Phillip and Leg Horse have decided to visit PHillip's parents for the holidays.
While they were about to have their CHRISTMAS dinner, a package from DRACULA had arrived to them being carried by a weird looking fellow named KRAMPUS.

The beast laid the package and went as soon as Phillip picked it from his hands, inside a little letter read:

Greeting friends! As a CHRIMBO GIFT I have decided to gift you this set of RADIOACTIVE FIESTA DINNER WARE! I hope you guys like them, they're very special!

After Phillip finished reading the letter he didn't hesitate to open the package and take out the plates to use them for their dinner, but as soon as Phillip touched them him and Leg Horse had been transported to somewhere completelly different. #action #adventure #rpg #spacefuneral #space_funeral
